Maybe the thing to do is to run a study of what happens for a range of 
different parameters for a few different test problems, then write up 
the results as a journal article. This would enable everyone to get a 
feel for how the parameters affect the evolution and enable people to 
get better guesstimates in future.

> > be enough :)
